title: Old Spanish National Historic Trail: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons        Discover Old Spanish trail corridors: This section of the Virgin River Canyon Recreation Area is off Interstate 15 about 20 miles southwest of St. George, Utah and about 20 miles northeast of Mesquite, Nevada. NPS   Â    Operating Hours & Seasons There are many historic sites, museums, and parks (federal, state, and local) along Old Spanish National Historic Trail. Operating hours vary from site to site.  Contact individual sites for more information by going to the Passport Program web page, where sites are listed by state, and there is an interactive map to search for sites.  Trail brochures can be found on the Publications web page.
